name: trending_games
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool all_in_one_crypto_swiss_knife.
Tool description: Coins, NFTS, Portfolio tracker, Whales, airdrops, news, tweets, YT videos, reddit posts, DeFi protocols,, games, podcasts, events, gas price and more!
API description: get trending play 2 earn games

pagesize.description: The number of results to return per page. Defaults to '20'.

page.description: The page number to retrieve. Defaults to '1'.
